channel.title: Last error i hope
channel.description:
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. ---ZymusScape by Zyle |-Enabled-| --- ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3510 zymus is signing onto server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 27 at client.process(client.java:16659) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3512 zymus is signing onto server. [client-2-zymus]: zymus is already online.
any help on that one? and im the onnly one on my server atm.

item.title: Last error i hope
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

it happened after i added something for upgrading but i cant remember what. ill go check.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 12:55:10 PM[/size][hr]ok didnt work. can an experienced java coder help me out here?

item.title: Last error i hope
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok soory for making another post iwas being a retard. here’s the line.

					IPPart1 = *here*Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(0, start[0]));
					IPPart2 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring((start[0] + 1), start[1]));
					IPPart3 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring((start[1] + 1), start[2]));
					IPPart4 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring((start[2] + 1), (start[3])));
				} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
				}
			}
		}
		playerLastConnect = connectedFrom;

		//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, ((IPPart1 << 24)+(IPPart2 << 16)+(IPPart3 << 8)+IPPart4), lastlogintime);
ServerHelp();

thanks for help. and then it only happens when i log in. before i log in theres no errors but when i press the login button this appears.
